root.description: The room is cold and dark.
root.hint: Geralt: "Maybe I can (use) something in my (inventory) to light up the [darkness]."

exit.description: The only source of light is star light twinkling in through the [gate].
exit.onCheck: The [gate] is the only path you can see.

prop.description: The [darkness] is so dense it is almost blinding.
prop.onCheck: The [darkness] is just waiting to be lit up.

prop.description: The sound of your breath echoes in your ears. The [walls] of this room must be close.
prop.onCheck: You cannot see anything, but reaching out your hand, you feel [marks] carved into one of the [walls].
It's hard to tell what cause the marks without seeing them.
